Title: Vigilors
Legend: Clad in thunderstrike armour, Vigilors are skilled archers who fearlessly scout out a path for their brethren. Their arrows conjure brief flashes of lightning upon impact, a form of battle-cant that directs the advance of their kin.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Battleline in a Stormcast Eternals army if general is a KNIGHT-JUDICATOR

Intro: Each model in a Vigilors unit is armed with a Stormcaller Bow and Stormblade.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Thunderhead Brotherhood • Vanguard Wing • Lord Vorst’s Retinue

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Vigilor-Prime. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Stormcaller Bow.

Rules.Name: Navigators Of The Storm
Rules.Fluff: Vigilors move swiftly beneath dark thunderheads to assess the path for their descending brethren. The Grungni-forged arrowheads of their stormcaller bows unleash flickers of lightning that illuminate their target and allow vital reconnaissance.
Rules.Rule: Navigators of the Storm: In the shooting phase, if any wounds caused by attacks made with this unit’s Stormcaller Bows are allocated to an enemy unit, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks that target that unit until the end of that turn. The same unit cannot be affected by this ability more than once per turn.
